original_text: Naaman said, ‘Yes, I will. But please agree to take 6,000 pieces of silver.’ He asked Gehazi to accept them. He put the 6,000 pieces of silver into two bags, as well as two sets of clothes. He gave them to two of his servants and they carried them in front of Gehazi.
korean_text: 나아만이 이르되 바라건대 두 달란트를 받으라 하고 그를 강권하여 은 두 달란트를 두 전대에 넣어 매고 옷 두 벌을 아울러 두 사환에게 지우매 그들이 게하시 앞에서 지고 가니라

sentences.original_text: But please agree to take 6,000 pieces of silver.'
He asked Gehazi to accept them.
He put the 6,000 pieces of silver into two bags
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 은 6,000개를 두 개의 가방에 넣었다

sentences.original_text: as well as two sets of clothes.
He gave them to two of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 자신의 종 두 명에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: and they carried them in front of Gehazi.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것들을 게하시 앞에서 운반했다.
